metadata.title: CVE-2021-33829 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the HTML Data Processor in CKEditor 4 4.14.0 through 4.16.x before 4.16.1 allows remote attackers to inject executable JavaScript code through a crafted comment because --!> is mishandled.

criterions.comment: ckeditor package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
